se.cbb.jprime.mcmc

Interface Model

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Dependent, InfoProvider, ProperDependent, Sampleable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DLRSModel, RealParameterUniformPrior, SubstitutionModel

    public interface Model
extends ProperDependent, Sampleable, InfoProvider
    Interface for probabilistic models. Subject to change, and very spartan at the moment.

    A model is a ProperDependent, and as such, typically a sink in a dependency DAG where the state parameters are sources. It should ideally compute its likelihood when cacheAndUpdateAndSetChangeInfo() is invoked, and only return this value when getLikelihood() is called. Also, it should be able to cache and restore its old values if the proposed state is rejected like any other ProperDependent. Priors are currently also encouraged to implement this interface.

    Furthermore, a model can act as a "sampleable". No particular requirements are made as to what is sampled, although outputting the model's log-likelihood is recommended.

    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LogDouble getLikelihood()
      Returns the (often conditional) probability density of the observations given the current model instantiation, priors, and current parameters.

        cacheAndUpdate, clearCache, getParentDependents, restoreCache

      • Methods inherited from interface se.cbb.jprime.io.Sampleable

        getSampleHeader, getSampleType, getSampleValue

      • Methods inherited from interface se.cbb.jprime.mcmc.InfoProvider

        getPostInfo, getPreInfo

      • getLikelihood

        LogDouble getLikelihood()
        Returns the (often conditional) probability density of the observations given the current model instantiation, priors, and current parameters.
